analysis.description:
TaxiCrowdsale._getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/15/0x49dc07a8516e1da8f9409dce0d456f3c1f559296.sol#627-672) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- TaxiCrowdsale.overflowOwner
	- TaxiCrowdsale.overflowAmount
	- TaxiCrowdsale.leftovers
	- TaxiCrowdsale.toSellTillNextStep
	- Crowdsale.rate

Reentrancy in TaxiCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/15/0x49dc07a8516e1da8f9409dce0d456f3c1f559296.sol):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/15/0x49dc07a8516e1da8f9409dce0d456f3c1f559296.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/15/0x49dc07a8516e1da8f9409dce0d456f3c1f559296.sol)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x49dc07a8516e1da8f9409dce0d456f3c1f559296.sol#530-532) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x49dc07a8516e1da8f9409dce0d456f3c1f559296.sol#531-532)
